DOC.brief_summary: This phase 1 multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , ascend dose study investigate pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , safety , tolerability CSL112 adult subject moderate renal impairment healthy adult subject normal renal function .
DOC.brief_title: A Study CSL112 Healthy Adults Adults With Moderate Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 18 85 year ( inclusive ) age , body weight 50 kg . Subjects renal impairment ( RI ) must stable chronic moderate RI ( estimate glomerular filtration rate [ eGFR ] ≥ 30 < 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) Healthy subject must normal renal function ( eGFR ≥ 90 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) Evidence clinically significant medical condition , disorder disease Evidence hepatobiliary disease Any clinically relevant abnormal laboratory test result Known history allergy , hypersensitivity deficiency CSL112 components Other severe comorbid condition , concurrent medication , issue render subject unsuitable participation study , include : history cancer , low platelet count , bleed disorder coagulopathy , significantly alter electrocardiogram waveform , unstable glycemia control subject diabetes , acute renal failure , recent donation loss blood Evidence history alcohol substance abuse
